mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board ( b_num, b_title, b_hit, b_content, b_writer, b_date, b_time )VALUES( b_num.NEXTVAL, #{b_title}, #{b_hit}, #{b_content}, #{b_writer}, #{b_date}, #{b_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET b_title = #{b_title}, b_hit = #{b_hit}, b_content = #{b_content}, b_writer = #{b_writer}, b_date = #{b_date}, b_time = #{b_time} WHERE b_num = #{b_num}
